## UnpublishItemsRequest interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface UnpublishItemsRequest
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                        | Modifiers | Type                                                         | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [includeChildPublications?](./extensions.unpublishitemsrequest.includechildpublications.md)     |           | boolean                                                      | _(Optional)_ Value indicating whether to resolve items also from all child Publications where user has PublishManagement rights.                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [includeCurrentPublication?](./extensions.unpublishitemsrequest.includecurrentpublication.md)   |           | boolean                                                      | _(Optional)_ Value indicating whether items will be (un)published inside the current Publication.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [itemIds](./extensions.unpublishitemsrequest.itemids.md)                                        |           | ReadonlyArray&lt;[ItemUri](./models.itemuri.md)<!-- -->&gt;  | The identifiers of the items that will be send for un-publishing.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [priority?](./extensions.unpublishitemsrequest.priority.md)                                     |           | [PublishPriority](./models.publishpriority.md)               | _(Optional)_ The priority of the un-publish action.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [publishInChildPublications?](./extensions.unpublishitemsrequest.publishinchildpublications.md) |           | ReadonlyArray&lt;[ItemUri](./models.itemuri.md)<!-- -->&gt;  | _(Optional)_ Collection of TCM URIs of child Publications where items will be unpublished.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [startAt?](./extensions.unpublishitemsrequest.startat.md)                                       |           | string                                                       | _(Optional)_ Date and time when the un-publishing should be started. Should be specified in UTC format. The value will be converted to UTC time if specified with time zone shift, e.g. "2020-01-24T17:24:50+02:00" will be converted to "2020-01-24T15:24:50Z" Conversion is not happening if time zone shift is not specified. |
| [structureResolveOption?](./extensions.unpublishitemsrequest.structureresolveoption.md)         |           | [StructureResolveOption](./models.structureresolveoption.md) | _(Optional)_ Value indicating the option to include the resolved items and/or structure.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [targetIdsOrPurposes?](./extensions.unpublishitemsrequest.targetidsorpurposes.md)               |           | ReadonlyArray&lt;string&gt;                                  | _(Optional)_ A collection of Publishing Target instances (Target Types or Purposes) where the items are published to.                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
